longBusinessSummary: Holdco Nuvo Group D.G Ltd engages in the research, development, and marketing of medical devices for pregnancy monitoring in Israel, the United States, and internationally. It provides INVU platform, a remote pregnancy monitoring platform that provides expectant mothers with a self -administered wireless sensory band, which enables them and their obstetricians to monitor maternal and fetal heart rate, and maternal uterine activity at home and in the clinic from the 32nd week of pregnancy until the beginning of labor. The company's INVU platform includes a wireless sensory band with multi-modality technology to capture signals to enable the INVU platform; and a cloud computing environment that processes and analyzes data and transmits personalized reports on maternal and fetal health metrics to the expectant mother and her obstetrician through digital visualization tools. It has a collaboration with Royal Philips and Charité  Universitätsmedizin Berlin. The company was formerly known as Nuvo Group Ltd. and changed its name to Holdco Nuvo Group D.G Ltd in May 2024. Holdco Nuvo Group D.G Ltd incorporated in 2006 and is headquartered in Tel Aviv, Israel.
